summary: This small mod cleans up the inside of The Bannered Mare, and adds a few things.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/noahnOi.jpg[/img]

In this mod I have made The Bannered Mare in Whiterun look a little less cluttered. I have added a loft above the bar counter with a bed, and a chest, as well as re designed the main room subtly, and made the room with a fire pit in to a quiet fireside room with an Alchemy table for potion brewing.

Manual install: Download manually, then toss that bitch in the data folder. Simple as that.Â 

Make sure to check out my other mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60038/?]Whiterun Executioner Platform[/url]
